snippet.title: A Little to the Left: Seeing Stars - Official DLC Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the new A Little to the Left trailer for the cozy puzzle game’s upcoming Seeing Stars DLC. Sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements to find stars. The A Little to the Left: Seeing Stars DLC features 33 new levels, five bonus levels, 100 stars to discover, and more.

A Little to the Left: Seeing Stars DLC will be released on June 25, 2024 for Game Pass, PC, Mac, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox consoles, and Nintendo Switch.
